change.title: Expert Evidence Regulation

Section 5 was enacted by BC Reg 31/2021, effective February 12, 2021.
Section 5 (1) definition of "excluded disbursements", paragraphs (c) and (d) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 241/2023, effective November 27, 2023.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: disbursements incurred by a party if the court ordered the costs of the proceeding to be paid as special costs;
disbursements incurred for an expert report on the issue of liability, if the court ordered that those expenses are excluded disbursements.

change.changenote: Section 5 (1) definition of "excluded disbursements", paragraphs (e) and (f) were added by BC Reg 241/2023, effective November 27, 2023.
Section 5 (3) BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 241/2023, effective November 27, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The limits set out in subsection (2) do not apply

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: to a vehicle injury proceeding if

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: a notice of trial was filed and served before August 12, 2020, and
the trial date set out in the notice of trial filed in relation to the vehicle injury proceeding is before June 1, 2021, or

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: to a vehicle injury proceeding if

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: a notice of trial was filed and served before August 12, 2020,
the trial date set out in the notice of trial filed in relation to the vehicle injury proceeding is on or after June 1, 2021, and
the court is satisfied that the party necessarily or properly incurred disbursements before August 12, 2020 in excess of the disbursement limit.

change.changenote: Sections 5 (4) to (10) were added by BC Reg 241/2023, effective November 27, 2023.
